pages.text: Wizards are relatives of Villagers, however they prefer to live alone, isolated from the dangers of a village. If you go up to them, they won't even talk to you unless you can convince them you're a wizard yourself - usually all it takes is being dressed as one.$(br2)If they believe you're a wizard, they'll even trade magical items with you, including the valuable Scroll of Knowledge, allowing you to increase your own power!
